description: A photoplotter is used to make photolithography masks, or photo plots, for PCBs. Photoplots are transparent plates that have maps printed on them to overlay onto PCBs.
NOTE: The Gerber format was originally developed by Gerber Systems but is now maintained by Ucamco.

common_filenames.description: [projectname].gpi - The GPI file is named after the name of your PCB project.
